channel.title: Dan Lin on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Dan Lin on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: “I Don’t See the Fandom Slowing Down”: How ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Became One of Netflix’s Biggest — and Most Unexpected — Hits
item.description: Directors Maggie Kang and Chris Appelhans and Netflix film boss Dan Lin weigh in on how a unique concept and authenticity propelled the animated feature into long-term success.
